parentProduct.title: Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization Implementation Guide for Human Clinical Trials Version 2.2

description: A findings domain that contains ECG data, including position of the subject, method of evaluation, all cycle measurements and all findings from the ECG including an overall interpretation if collected or derived. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C49626, 2021-06-25)
label: ECG Test Results
name: EG
